Build a fully designed Ethiopian fintech app named **Ethiopay**, inspired by Telebirr and Mpesa, with modern UI and secure backend.

🟢 Core Features:
1. User Authentication
   - Phone number + OTP login (via Firebase or custom SMS gateway)
   - Google Sign-in (no email verification prompt)
   - Optional PIN & biometric login (fingerprint/Face ID)
   - Profile management: edit name, phone, photo, password, and PIN

2. Wallet System
   - Display real-time user balance
   - Send & receive money to other Ethiopay users
   - Deposit via Telebirr, Mpesa, or Commercial Bank of Ethiopia API
   - Withdraw to linked accounts (Telebirr, Bank, Mpesa)
   - Transaction history with receipts

3. Payments
   - Pay electricity, water, and Wi-Fi bills
   - Buy airtime and data packages
   - Pay merchants using QR codes or user phone number
   - Integrate Telebirr and ArifPay API gateways

4. Transaction Fees
   - Up to 100 ETB → 0.50 ETB fee
   - 101–500 ETB → 1 ETB fee
   - 501–1000 ETB → 2 ETB fee
   - 1001–1500 ETB → 3 ETB fee
   - Fee auto-sent to owner’s account

5. Owner Panel
   - View all user accounts and transactions
   - Manage transaction fees and service updates
   - Verify new business accounts
   - Owner email: `ethiopay004@gmail.com`

6. Security
   - Email verification & OTP confirmation
   - Fraud detection and blocked user system
   - Encrypted transaction logs

7. UI/UX
   - Modern, minimal Ethiopian fintech design
   - Animated transitions & progress bars
   - Home screen shortcuts after install (like Play Store)
   - Works perfectly on web and mobile (PWA ready)

8. API Integrations
   - Telebirr payment gateway: `https://developerportal.ethiotelebirr.et:38443/apiaccess/payment/gateway`
   - Mpesa API
   - Firebase for authentication
   - ArifPay for merchant transactions

💾 Tech Stack:
React Native (Expo) + Firebase + Rocket Backend + Telebirr API + ArifPay API

🎨 Theme:
Ethiopian flag accent colors (Green, Yellow, Red)
Professional gradient blue primary theme for fintech UI.
